name: Game of Thrones
about: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.
creator: David Benioff, D.B. Weiss

name: Stranger Things
about: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
creator: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer

name: Peaky Blinders
about: A gangster family epic set in 1919 Birmingham, England; centered on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.
creator: Steven Knight

name: Black Mirror
about: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.
creator: Charlie Brooker

name: Dark
about: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.
creator: Baran bo Odar, Jantje Friese

name: The Boys
about: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.
creator: Eric Kripke, Evan Goldberg, Seth Rogen
